Name: Orc's Civil War
About the game: This a real-time strategy classic game, The Game Offers A Variety Of Unit Combinations, With Melee, Remote, Magic And Ultra-long-range Units, Allowing Players To Implement Different Strategies And Flexibly Use Various Combinations To Accomplish Multiple Tasks. The Game Has A Total Of 12 Levels And 9 Additional Quests. After Completing The Quest, Use The Skill Points You Have Won To Upgrade Your Units And Get Them On The Battlefield. The Envious Enemy Will Carry Out Multi-line Attack, Effectively Allocate Units And Multi-line Operations To Complete The Task Effectively.
